headline.main: VICHY SCRAPS COUNCIL MAKING CONSTITUTION; Plans Revamping of National Body, Stresses Mayors' Role

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Oct. 2 -- France's National Council, created a year ago by Marshal Henri Philippe Petain to frame the new Constitution and to give advisory opinions on governmental questions, has been scrapped and will be reorganized upon an entirely new basis, it was announced today.
abstract: Natl Council scrapped; to be reorganized on new basis; State Min L Romier on reform plans
